guide.introduction_rendered:
• Hopper Support Model
  • Grate Support Model

Additional Materials Required:

  • 3/4"x1.5" Bolts (2)
  • 3/4" Nuts (2)
  • Shaker Mount
Tools
  • Angle grinder
  • Punch
  • Welder
  • torch

lines.text: Torch away the necessary areas. See diagrams.
lines.text_raw: Torch away the necessary areas. See diagrams.

lines.text: The holes for the hopper mounting need to be 28" away from the bottom side. Mark 28" on the opposite tubing walls and torch 1/2" holes. Insure a 1/2" bolt goes all the way thru.
lines.text_raw: The holes for the hopper mounting need to be 28" away from the bottom side. Mark 28" on the opposite tubing walls and torch 1/2" holes. Insure a 1/2" bolt goes all the way thru.

lines.text: Torch the cutaway at the top and the slot.
lines.text_raw: Torch the cutaway at the top and the slot.

lines.text: Lay one support on the table, with the grate mount slot touching the table.
lines.text_raw: Lay one support on the table, with the grate mount slot touching the table.

lines.text: Get the Shaker Mount and tighten 3/4" bolts with nuts to the Soil Shaker so the bolt head is where the hammer will be.
lines.text_raw: Get the Shaker Mount and tighten 3/4" bolts with nuts to the Soil Shaker so the bolt head is where the hammer will be.

lines.text: Prop this up on the hopper support, so the first bolt is about 2" above the 28" hole and both bolts are touching the support.
lines.text_raw: Prop this up on the hopper support, so the first bolt is about 2" above the 28" hole and both bolts are touching the support.

lines.text: Mark which side of the shaker you are welding the bolts for.
lines.text_raw: Mark which side of the shaker you are welding the bolts for.

lines.text: Tack the bolts in place, remove the nuts and dismount the shaker.
lines.text_raw: Tack the bolts in place, remove the nuts and dismount the shaker.

lines.text: Protect the threads, and finish welding the bolts to the support.
lines.text_raw: Protect the threads, and finish welding the bolts to the support.

lines.text: You are only doing this on one of the supports, the other side, you will do in place, so the spacing is correct.
lines.text_raw: You are only doing this on one of the supports, the other side, you will do in place, so the spacing is correct.

lines.text: Punch the hole on the bottom of the supports for each.
lines.text_raw: Punch the hole on the bottom of the supports for each.

lines.text: Torch away a 4" section on the top of each grate to make it like the model shown.
lines.text_raw: Torch away a 4" section on the top of each grate to make it like the model shown.

lines.text: Remember that the two are mirrored.
lines.text_raw: Remember that the two are mirrored.

lines.text: Cut away the corner so the hopper wont hit it, about a 1" 45 degree triangle.
lines.text_raw: Cut away the corner so the hopper wont hit it, about a 1" 45 degree triangle.

lines.text: Torch a slot for a 3/4" bolt at the top of the mount, as shown.
lines.text_raw: Torch a slot for a 3/4" bolt at the top of the mount, as shown.
